metadata.synopsis: Two teenagers discuss sneaking past the South Span Checkpoint. This is the human's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 6.5;50;-18.5- Talk to the human of the Horny Stupid Teenagers vignette

0.speaker: Hunkers Boolean
0.text: Ever wanted to meet the most cowardly dragonborn in the Realms? I fell for the blockhead.
